# setDefaultResult()

**Instance Method**

Sets the text paste item’s value to the default value based on the item provider’s data.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func setDefaultResult()
```

## Discussion

You call this method, as a fallback, for any items you don’t handle. Setting the default result when the item provider’s data isn’t supported is the same as calling the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteItem/setNoResult()] method.

## Setting a text paste item’s result value

- **setResult(string:)**: Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified plaintext string from the item provider.
- **setResult(attributedString:)**: Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified attributed string from the item provider.
- **setResult(attachment:)**: Sets a text paste item’s attachment value to a specified value.
- **setNoResult()**: Sets the text paste item’s textual value to not include data from the item provider.
